'''Samuel Åberg''' is an Audio Director<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/credits</ref><ref name="video">{{ytl|4XmJPb4Qt5Y|HOW MINECRAFT SOUNDS ARE MADE|Minecraft|August 3, 2024}}</ref> at [[Mojang Studios]] since 2015<ref>[https://www.linkedin.com/in/samuel-åberg-34a051151/ Samuel Åberg on Linkedin]</ref>.

== Trivia ==
<!-- Please do not claim that he created the sounds for the villagers in the game. He did not create the sounds for the villagers, he merely demonstrated how the sounds were made in the video. The villager sounds were made by C418 back in 2013. -->
* To create the sounds that the [[dolphin]]s<ref name="dolphin" /> and [[panda]]s<ref>{{ytl|7mi5au5qH8g|Recording Panda sounds for Minecraft!|Minecraft|October 9, 2018}}</ref> make in the game he went to [[Wikipedia:Kolmården Wildlife Park|Kolmården Wildlife Park]] and [[Wikipedia:zh:長隆野生動物世界|Chimelong Safari Park]].
* To create [[phantom]]s' sounds he used the voice of his child crying.<ref name="video" />
* To make the sounds for the [[drowned]], he gurgled milk.<ref>https://youtube.com/shorts/FnmvKDxVQjM</ref>
* His in-game skin resembles American guitarist {{w|Buckethead}}.
